Ahuja, Mona R wrote:

> I need to test the executeQuery method of this class . How  do I Pass the
> mock  connection object to this class.
> I cannot extend this class since this has a private constructor.Extending
> this class and adding a setter function function for connection should be
> the ideal thing to do .But since the constructor is private I cannot do that
> .Even composition willnot help since connection is a private variable of
> this class.

You will have to change the class design to make it possible to test 
using the mock object approach. I recommend making the constructor public.
--
